page.title: 03Eastchurch Village School
page.content: Eastchurch{Primary School}provides {education}for children between the ages of 5 and 9. The children can then move on to one of four Middle Schools on the Island. Its catchment area includes the {village}itself, surrounding farms, Warden, Warden Bay, Leysdown and parts of Minster. Most of the children are bussed from these villages. The school is an old building with a modern extension which includes classrooms,a playroom, a music room, a hall, and a canteen. There are two infant classes, one class of mixed age range and two classes of older children. Outside is a large field as well as playground facilities. There is a pond and a vegetable patch which the {children}tend.
